item.title: Naomi add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Zelda Fitzgerald
item.description: "Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold." -- Zelda Fitzgerald

item.title: Naomi add a quote by James A. Baldwin
item.description: "Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up." -- James A. Baldwin

item.title: Naomi add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "I like not only to be loved, but also to be told that I am loved. I am not sure that you are of the same mind. But the realm of silence is large enough beyond the grave. This is the world of light and speech, and I shall take leave to tell you that you are very dear." -- George Eliot

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Give a girl an education and introduce her properly into the world, and ten to one but she has the means of settling well, without further expense to anybody. " -- Jane Austen

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "She was a girl who knew how to be happy even when she was sad. And that’s important—you know " -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You alone are enough. You have nothing to prove to anybody." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "Why is it," he said, one time, at the subway entrance, "I feel I've known you so many years?" "Because I like you," she said, "and I don't want anything from you." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "Listen. To live is to be marked. To live is to change, to acquire the words of a story, and that is the only celebration we mortals really know. In perfect stillness, frankly, I've only found sorrow." -- Barbara Kingsolver
